titleStmt.title: The other parte of Christian questions and answeares which is concerning the sacraments, writte[n] by Theodore Beza Vezelian: to which is added a large table of the same questions. Translated out of Latine into Englishe by Iohn Field.
Quaestionum et responsionum Christianarum libellus. Pars altera. English
titleStmt.author: Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605.
Fielde, John, d. 1588.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by John Fielde, of: Bèze, Théodore de. Quaestionum et responsionum Christianarum libellus. Pars altera.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
